history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: wf_inverse_rel. qsimpl time: 1 use: wf_inverse_image,fst,wf_inverse_rel. qsimpl time: 1 use: wf_inverse_image,fst,wf_inverse_rel.

exceptions.exn: In environment A, B : Set lt : Rel A R : Rel B wfgt : well_founded lt declt : DecRel A lt wR : WR B R Unable to unify "forall a : ?M1437, Acc (fun x y : ?M1437 => exists2 b : ?M1438, ?M1440 x b & forall c : ?M1438, ?M1440 y c -> ?M1439 b c) a" with "Bar (A * B) (GoodR (A * B) (ProdRel A B leq R)) nil".

In environment H : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (F : A -> B -> Prop), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => exists2 b : B, F x b & forall c : B, F y c -> R b c) A, B : Set lt : Rel A R : Rel B wfgt : well_founded lt declt : DecRel A lt wR : WR B R The term "fst" has type "?A * ?B -> ?A" while it is expected to have type "A -> A".

In environment H1 : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (F : A -> B -> Prop), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => exists2 b : B, F x b & forall c : B, F y c -> R b c) A, B : Set lt : Rel A R : Rel B wfgt : well_founded lt declt : DecRel A lt wR : WR B R H0 : forall (A B : Type) (R : B -> B -> Prop) (f : A -> B), well_founded R -> well_founded (fun x y : A => R (f x) (f y)) X0 : B -> B -> B Unable to unify "well_founded lt" with "WR (A * B) (ProdRel A B leq R)".

original: apply wf_inverse_rel. - apply (wf_inverse_image A A lt fst). apply wfgt. - intros [a b] [a' b'] [Hlt [Heq HleqR]]. apply Relation_Operators.symprod_ind. -- intros x x' Hxaa y. unfold leq in *. simpl in *. destruct (declt y a'); tauto. -- intros y y' HRx b0. apply wR. destruct HF. auto.
